  • Method Details

    • setGUI

      public void setGUI(UserInterface pUserInterface)
      Initializes the user interface and displays the welcome message.
      Parameters:
      pUserInterface - The user interface for the game.

    • createRooms

      private void createRooms()
      Creates the different rooms in the game, along with their exits and items.

    • printWelcome

      private void printWelcome()
      Displays the welcome message to the player.

    • printHelp

      private void printHelp()
      Displays help with the list of available commands.

    • printLocationInfo

      private void printLocationInfo()
      Displays the current room's description and its image.

    • look

      private void look(String pSecondWord)
      Displays the detailed description of the current room or examines one or more objects in the current room.
      Parameters:
      pSecondWord - The name of the object or list of objects separated by spaces.

    • eat

      private void eat(String pItemName)
      Displays a message indicating the player has eaten or allows to eat the magicCookie.
      Parameters:
      pItemName - The name of the item to eat.

    • fix

      private void fix(String pSecondWord)
      Checks if the player has fixed a bug using a specific object.
      Parameters:
      pSecondWord - The keyword needed to complete the game.

    • take

      private void take(String pItemName)
      Allows the player to pick up an item in the current room if they can carry it.
      Parameters:
      pItemName - The name of the item to pick up.

    • drop

      private void drop(String pItemName)
      Allows the player to drop an item in the current room.
      Parameters:
      pItemName - The name of the item to drop.

    • back

      private void back(String pXTime)
      Moves the player back to the previous room(s), depending on the command. If a specific number of "back" commands is provided, it goes back that many times.
      Parameters:
      pXTime - The number of times "back" is specified, or null for a single back.

    • test

      private void test(Command pUneCommande)
      Executes a series of commands from a test file located in the "./tests" directory.
      Parameters:
      pUneCommande - The command specifying the test file to execute.

    • items

      private void items()
      Displays the list of items currently in the player's inventory.

    • interpretCommand

      public void interpretCommand(String pCommandLine)
      Interprets and executes a given command line string. If the command ends the game, the game terminates.
      Parameters:
      pCommandLine - The command line string entered by the player.

    • goRoom

      private void goRoom(Command pCommand)
      Try to go to one direction. If there is an exit, enter the new room, otherwise print an error message.

    • getRestartGame

      public boolean getRestartGame()
      Retrieves the state of the restart game flag.
      Returns:
      True if the game is ready to restart, false otherwise.

    • endGame

      private void endGame(boolean pRestartQuestion)
      Ends the game, optionally prompting the player to restart the game.
      Parameters:
      pRestartQuestion - True to ask the player if they want to restart, false to end the game.
